'''Blunt Attacks''' or '''Heavy Attacks''' refer to attacks that can damage {{Geo}} objects and certain [[Shield]]s more significantly than others, as well as [[Frozen#Shatter|Shatter]] Frozen targets. These include:
* [[Claymore]] Attacks, except [[Kinich]]'s [[Nightsun Style|Mid-Air Normal Attack]].
* [[Plunging Attacks]] (Except [[Bow]] and [[Catalyst]])
* Most {{Color|Geo DMG}}, except:<ref group="Note">Non-Blunt Geo attacks can still trigger Shatter, but do not benefit from the increased effectiveness against Geo Constructs and Shields.</ref>
** [[Ningguang]]'s [[Sparkling Scatter|Plunging Attack]]
** [[Gorou]]'s [[Ripping Fang Fletching|Charged Attack]] and [[Juuga: Forward Unto Victory|Crystal Collapses]]
** [[Yun Jin]]'s [[Opening Flourish]]
** [[Chiori]]'s [[Tailor-Made|"Sode" Coordinated Attack]]
** [[Xilonen]]'s [[Yohual's Scratch|Elemental Skill]]
** Attacks [[Elemental Infusion|infused]] with Geo that were not originally Blunt.
* Most attacks that appear as explosions

Note that Blunt is a separate attribute from [[poise]] damage. Although there is a tendency for Blunt attacks to have high poise damage, it is not always true that having a high poise damage makes the attack Blunt.
